content: do not get a hole in the corner knit needle two and three as the stitches show in cable pattern take another needle and pick up the same number of stitches alongside the other side of the heelflap as you did before make sure that the first stitch is picked up before the heelflap row begin in the corner of needle three so you avoid a hole when you come to the needle with the heelflap stitches you knit half of the heelflap stitches unto your needle with the last picked up stitches this is now again needle 4 place the remaining stitches of the heelflap sts unto the needle with the first picked up sts this is now needle one the round begins in the center of your heel instep gusset shaping from now on knit the sts on needle 1 and 4 in stockinette stitch while knitting the sts on needle 2 and 3 in cable pattern on every other round you decrease one stitch of the picked up sts on needle 1 and 4 until you have 16 sts left on each needle 3 decrease like this on needle 1 knit until there are three sts left k2tog k1 decrease like this on needle 4 k1 s1 k1 psso knit until end of round start with knitting 1 row without decreases then start decreasing on the next row foot knit needle 2 and 3 in cable pattern and needle 1 and 4 in stockinette stitch for as long as your foot requires 2 inches/ 5 cm from the top of your toes make sure that you end the cable pattern with 2-4 row after a row of crossing stitches this will look best toe knit your favourite toe that fits your shape here is mine make sure that you have 16 sts or an even number of stitches on each needle knit your toe in stockinette stitch needle 1 knit until you have three sts left k2tog k1 needle 2 knit 1 sl1 k1 psso knit until end of round needle 3 knit until you have 3 sts left k2tog k1 needle 4 k1 sl1 k1 psso knit until end of round knit the decreases every other round so you alternate one row with decreases one row plain stockinette stitch continue in this way until you have the shape that fits your toes i usually continue until i have six stitches on each needle that fits my toes graft the remaining stitches with the kitchener stitch wear and enjoy please feel free to knit as many of these socks as you like but please do not reproduce the pattern or display the pattern publicly without my permission 4
